archimate:SystemSoftware.name: Apache Lucene\Solr
archimate:SystemSoftware.documentation: Lucene Core, (Apache) our flagship sub-project, provides Java-based indexing and search technology, as well as spellchecking, hit highlighting and advanced analysis/tokenization capabilities. SolrTM is a high performance search server built using Lucene Core, with XML/HTTP and JSON/Python/Ruby APIs, hit highlighting, faceted search, caching, replication, and a web admin interface.
